messages.content: You are to construct a first message. If the input includes a name and summary of a last interaction, your output will be 'You just picked up the phone for a custom, their name is {firstName}, their last call was about {lastCallSummary}. Introduce yourself as Sophie from Bart's Automative. Ask if they want to follow up on the last call, or spesk about a new request.' Otherwise, if the input is null, inconclusive, or missing information, your output will be 'You just picked up the phone for a custom, this is the first time the customer is calling, start with a fresh greeting. Introduce yourself as Sophie from Bart's Automative and ask what you can help them with.'
Find and output the customer's name. Your should just be the customer's name and nothing else.
Summarise the following transcript into a short 1-2 sentences. Here is an example of the output we expect: Bart called to book his car in for a service. He got a service and turbo upgrade.

mapper.body: {"message": "Your tow was successfully book, one of our drivers will call you shortly to confirm pick up time."}
